Aux Effect: Aura Junction (Air).name: Aux Effect: Aura Junction (Air)
Aux Effect: Aura Junction (Air).description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.X11Y3T1IzmtNqGMV]{Air Gate}'s aura junction trigger

Grants the target a +10-foot status bonus to their land and fly Speeds, which will persist after they leave the aura.

Aux Effect: Diamond Dust.name: Aux Effect: Diamond Dust
Aux Effect: Diamond Dust.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wjJW9hWY5CkkMvY5]{Diamond Dust} trigger

Link this effect in the spell's description and apply it when the spell is cast.

Aux Effect: Dread Flickering Addendum.name: Aux Effect: Dread Flickering Addendum
Aux Effect: Dread Flickering Addendum.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.abomination-vaults-bestiary.Actor.2TOXR7nKS6xPng2Y]{Dread Wisp}'s Dread Flickering trigger

It will temporarily add a description addendum to Dread Flickering, including its immunity effect.

Aux Effect: Dread Flickering Immunity.name: Aux Effect: Dread Flickering Immunity
Aux Effect: Dread Flickering Immunity.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.abomination-vaults-bestiary.Actor.2TOXR7nKS6xPng2Y]{Dread Wisp}'s Dread Flickering trigger

This effect will prevent the recipient from triggering the aforementioned event.

Aux Effect: Energy Shot.name: Aux Effect: Energy Shot
Aux Effect: Energy Shot.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TSDbyYRQwhIyY2Oq]{Energy Shot}

This effect grants you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.zocU4IYIlWwRKUuE]{Effect: Energy Shot}, and keeps track of your number of Energy Shot uses. After firing your last Energy Shot, both effects will be removed.

Aux Effect: Gibbering Addendum.name: Aux Effect: Gibbering Addendum
Aux Effect: Gibbering Addendum.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.dEAneTvoPuQXZoLR]{Gibbering Mouther}'s Gibbering trigger

It will temporarily add a description addendum to Gibbering, including its immunity effect.

Aux Effect: Gibbering Immunity.name: Aux Effect: Gibbering Immunity
Aux Effect: Gibbering Immunity.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.dEAneTvoPuQXZoLR]{Gibbering Mouther}'s Gibbering trigger

The effect will grant immunity to further gibbering events.

Aux Effect: Mirror Image.name: Aux Effect: Mirror Image
Aux Effect: Mirror Image.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}

This effect keeps track of the number of images. It will be automatically reduced when appropriate if its associated trigger is active.

For the purposes of its trigger, it's recommended this effect is linked in the spell's description, and used instead of the system-provided effect.

Aux Effect: Nettleskin.name: Aux Effect: Nettleskin
Aux Effect: Nettleskin.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BA143r8fCqmSjdRf]{Nettleskin}

When a character has this effect and the Nettleskin trigger is enabled, damage will be rolled automatically when an adjacent creature hits them with a melee or unarmed attack.

The effect must be added to the spell's description and dragged from there in order to have the correct scaling.

Aux Effect: One Shot, One Kill.name: Aux Effect: One Shot, One Kill
Aux Effect: One Shot, One Kill.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tlrde2xh7AhesXNB]{One Shot, One Kill}

Sets the necessary Roll Option for One Shot, One Kill damage to be automatically applied.

Aux Effect: Ravel of Thorns.name: Aux Effect: Ravel of Thorns
Aux Effect: Ravel of Thorns.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mHvkBdBN4gs6CH1g]{Ravel of Thorns} trigger.

You take a â€“10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speeds.

Aux Effect: Rooting.name: Aux Effect: Rooting
Aux Effect: Rooting.description: Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.yGgsoSA8EaaEsYZn]{Rooting} rune and its varieties.

Aux Effect: Safe Elements.name: Aux Effect: Safe Elements
Aux Effect: Safe Elements.description:
Auxiliary effect for kineticist triggers when they have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ZBPRABDXeLVwxFC7]{Safe Elements} feat.

This effect excludes you from being affected by the origin kineticist's triggers. Add it to the description of the kineticist's Safe Elements feat, and drag it from there.

Aux Effect: Scars of Steel.name: Aux Effect: Scars of Steel
Aux Effect: Scars of Steel.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.j8ycCi7ghTtpRjEW]{Scars of Steel}

This effect activates the roll option for Scars of Steel's resistance

Aux Effect: Shared Stratagem.name: Aux Effect: Shared Stratagem
Aux Effect: Shared Stratagem.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.N4wCUZH2KG6FoGqh]{Shared Stratagem} trigger

The investigator's Devise a Stratagem target is off-guard against your next attack.

Aux Effect: Spirit Link.name: Aux Effect: Spirit Link
Aux Effect: Spirit Link.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link}

The effect must be added to both the spellcaster and the target.

Aux Effect: Stench Addendum.name: Aux Effect: Stench Addendum
Aux Effect: Stench Addendum.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.PqGX4Dgy9siZJitH]{Stench} trigger

It will temporarily add a description addendum to Stench, including its immunity effect.

Aux Effect: Stench Immunity.name: Aux Effect: Stench Immunity
Aux Effect: Stench Immunity.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.PqGX4Dgy9siZJitH]{Stench} trigger

The effect will grant immunity to further stench events.

Aux Effect: Sword and Pistol.name: Aux Effect: Sword and Pistol
Aux Effect: Sword and Pistol.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWbISC0di0r4oPCi]{Sword and Pistol} trigger

The target of your ranged strike will be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against your next melee Strike with a one-handed weapon.

Aux Effect: Taunt.name: Aux Effect: Taunt
Aux Effect: Taunt.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.4DYFJ4TUsNkgFBDb]{Taunt}

You are off-guard for 1 round.

Aux Effect: Trickster's Mirrors.name: Aux Effect: Trickster's Mirrors
Aux Effect: Trickster's Mirrors.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cuKVbWWNzJj1GDpZ]{Trickster's Mirrors}

This effect keeps track of the number of mirrors. The number must be manually increased when the spell is sustained, but it will be automatically reduced when appropriate if its associated trigger is active.

Additionally, if the recipient receives area or splash damage, a reminder that all images are destroyed will be displayed.

Aux Effect: Vibrant Thorns.name: Aux Effect: Vibrant Thorns
Aux Effect: Vibrant Thorns.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nnSipUPNd3sm5vYL]{Vibrant Thorn}

When a character has this effect and the Nettleskin trigger is enabled, damage will be rolled automatically when adjacent creatures that hit them with a melee attack, as well as creatures that hit them with unarmed attacks.

Aux Effect: Vibrant Thorns (Increase Dam.name: Aux Effect: Vibrant Thorns (Increase Damage)
Aux Effect: Vibrant Thorns (Increase Dam.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nnSipUPNd3sm5vYL]{Vibrant Thorns}

Temporarily increase your Vibrant Thorns damage to d6s.

Aux Effect: Warning Stripes.name: Aux Effect: Warning Stripes
Aux Effect: Warning Stripes.description:
Auxiliary effect for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D4kArD91fFiREvC6]{Warning Stripes} trigger.

When a character has this effect and the Warning Stripes trigger is enabled, damage will be rolled automatically when they're hit with an unarmed melee attack.
